abstract: China's Dongfeng Race Team wins third-leg of Volvo Ocean Race around-the-world sailing race.
lead_paragraph: The Dongfeng Race Team closed to within 500 miles of a third-leg victory in the Volvo Ocean Race and a first for its country, China, in the around-the-world challenge.
snippet: The Dongfeng Race Team closed to within 500 miles of a third-leg victory in the Volvo Ocean Race and a first for its country, China, in the around-the-world challenge.
